venue.address_2: Off of Beacon Street - landmarks State House & Fox TV
venue.name: 21st Amendment

item.description:
Hi Guys,
- time again for a 'Thirsty First Thursday', this one on April Fools' Day at the 21st Amendment.

It's at the top of the hill on Bowdoin Street, next to the Statehouse, a short walk from Park Street.

Come along to meet some cool people, have a few beers, food and a good old-fashioned chat.

Spring is in the air!

Cheers, Steve O.
978-289-2364.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with a drink in my hand (call my cell 978-289-2364)

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thirsty First Thursday - April Fools' Style - i.e. Bring a joke.
